name: Claws And Roses
description:
Claws And Roses is a Top Down Shooter in PixelArt created for a school project.

We are in L2 Video Games and this is our second project/game of the year. We had 3 weeks to realize it. 

Our game programmer : Charles Piercourt.

Our game designers : Louis Gaubil & Mahiedine Boudrissa.

Our game artists : Nimlot Elise, Safran Reynaert and Steffy Guidez (me).

Don't hesitate to give us advices to improve and continue on the right way.
